document_data.name: Hall of the Fountain
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hall of the Fountain''' was located within the complex of the [[Palace of the Enlightened Throne]] in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The Hall of the Fountain was filled with enchanted water that remained within the room when any door was opened.
document_data.Activities: This hall housed the [[marid]]s who served the [[Grand Caliph]].
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Nereid]]s and [[water weird]]s assisted the marids in their duties.
